subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में केकर स्थित फॉमसेंटर क्या है।
explanation_en:
Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur known for its unique architecture.
In Hindi, it translates to 'Palace of Winds'.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल जैसेवाले आध्यान का स्पीक मंदिर
